lexUnit.name: stocky.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: -ier, -iest (especially of a person) short and sturdy.

sentence.text: I was a stocky baby with good bone , but perhaps my ears were on the large side -- but then so were Clark Gable 's and he did n't do so bad .
The fat man was stocky and broad-faced , but the fat was a thin disguise cloaking the layered muscles of a retired athlete now restricted by his job to twice-weekly sessions at the health club .
The speaker was short and stocky and that was all that could be said of him in the way of description .
He was stocky and broad-shouldered and he had thick black eyebrows .
He was stocky , bald , and invariably gabbled in an incomprehensible West of Scotland accent .
Willi 's strong , stocky body inserted itself under the Direktor 's arm and he supported him out through the theatre door towards the car .
A homely man of stocky build he sported an untidy moustache .
I follow his eyes from the bar to the jukebox , to the bearded one , to two like-faced girls with stocky builds and bleached blonde hair .
Another is 19-20 , 5ft , black , with a stocky build , a pock-marked face , a flat-top hair style and a thin moustache .
With his conventional double-breasted suit , carefully cut to disguise a distinctly stocky figure , and his watchful courtesy he was in sharp contrast to Hutton 's hard-edged efficiency .
She has boldly paraded her stocky figure at charity fashion shows and at one time was famous for wielding equally chunky Havana cigars .
A stocky figure with a heavy serge coat and a ` lum " hat set at a jaunty angle , turned to his two companions .
Reflected in the mirror he watched a stocky figure enter the bar , there was a hint of a dark uniform collar under the man 's heavy overcoat .
Habib Olahi , a stocky man , still stood at attention , his eyes fixed on the rich carpet .
` Why ? " demanded Simon , a stocky , angry man .
She smiled as the stocky man ambled up to them .
The stocky fair-haired young man smiled in friendly fashion , but Robert Sheldrake frowned .

Stevenson , a quick-moving , stocky northerner with a distinguished record in every possible branch of the Met , was rumoured to be going up to Assistant Commissioner just as soon as the present incumbent retired .
His wife , a short , stocky woman , was accompanying two evacuees , a boy and a girl .
The stocky woman looked intently at Buzz with raised eyebrows .
The driver is 6ft , about 23 years old , stocky , with very short hair .
Stocky and friendly , he had two small flaws in his character which were to be his undoing .
Feet firmly on the ground , the stocky Private Donkin methodically swung his tommy-gun , firing from left to right .
His belly hangs out over his belt now ; only a year ago , he looked stocky but still quite trim .
